name: deluxe baby blanket
notes:
spoil a newborn with this beautiful [**deluxe baby blanket**][1]. it is crocheted in sultan deluxe which is a yarn in 100% soft cotton available in fabulous color combinations. it has a gorgeous shell pattern which gives the blanket a wonderful look. 

happy crocheting!

materials:
-  crochet hook e (3.5mm)
- 1 skein sultan deluxe

finished size: 
approx. 28” x 28”

abbreviations:
**ch**: chain
**st**: stitch
**sl st**: slip stitch
**sc**: single crochet dc: double crochet


  [1]: https://hobbii.com/deluxe-baby-blanket?utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=deluxe-baby-blanket&utm_term=swr
